最近はめっきりまともな試合ができていない。一方的な試合が多く、余裕で勝ったり惨敗したり、そんな試合ばかり。勝つか負けるかのヒリツキなんて全く感じないし、キラー側は強パークを持って行ったとしても少し油断してたら簡単に試合展開をひっくり返されるのに、サバイバー側は人数が多い分いくらでもカバーが効く。でもキラーがかっこいいから俺はキラーをやる。ただ、新規がキラーをやることは天変地異と同義だと俺は思うし友達は誘えない

【サバイバーをやりたい方へ】
・キラーに比べてかなりマッチングするまでに時間がかかります。
・キラーは放置が多くマッチしても発電機を回すだけの作業と化すことが多いです。(低ランク帯だから？)
・キラーを煽るのはやめてください、ちゃんとキラーをやってくれているだけでありがたい、じゃなきゃゲームが成り立たない。

【キラーをやりたい方へ】
・マッチングに時間がかかることはほとんどありません。
・サバイバーメインのためキラーをやっていてそこまで経験がありませんが、キラーを煽っている人はちらほら見受けられるので耐性が必要だと思います。
・全滅でも一人を倒すのでもなく、一人を吊ることを目標にするとだいぶ楽だと思います。私はサバイバーメインだからということもありますが一人吊ることを目的にすると自然と、デッドバイデイライトですから楽しめると思います。

PS4版をやっていたとはいえへたくそなので他の方がレビューしているような高度な内容ではありませんが、何かの足しになれば幸いです。
Can get annoying but as a streamer its a fun way to play with viewers

I've never seen a game be so fun but also be such trash at the same time. There are a multitude of issues with this game from balance issue on both survivor and killer side, such as crutch mechanics, broken killer abilities and addons. Same with perks on both sides. Some are not expressly broken but are completely unfun to deal with. This game also has massive issues with hitboxes and server connections. The combination of the two will have you getting hit from china by the killer when you play survivor and missing grabs and hits as killer when playing against survivors. The community for the most part is toxic af and myself am guilty of this. A lot of the toxicity in this game stems from the broken/unbalanced/straight up unfun aspects of this game. The game 'can' be great fun if played with friends. Though played solo it can also be fun but I would not hedge you bets on that. For me 6/10 .
The game makes me wanna vomit on other people sometimes. In game as well as in rl. 10/10
dbd is completely ruined, they took away stretch, they took away the old movement, every killer is op. and even if i play on low settings i get 30 fps with no stretch, very good job devs

I would not recommend this game to others, the game is a mere shadow of it's former self due to the constant unneeded changes the devs subject this game to. Again, I DO NOT recommend this game to people, the development team for this game is too busy worrying about being woke and inclusive rather than preserving the fun parts about the game. Not even to mention how killer-sided this game is now. They release a character named Mikaela Reid who had amazing perks that actually gave the survivors a chance to win against a killer that would down you, hook you, and then camp you until death, her perks gave you a trick to hide up your sleeve against the killer until the killer would take the time to find the boon totem. Now the boon totem perk called Boon: Circle of Healing doesn't do anything close to what it once did, now it's a useless perk and nobody runs it. What I don't understand is why introduce something strong for the survivors to rely on and then take it away? I know they never do that for the killers side, for the killers side in this game they will add as many things to give the killer an edge while leaving the survivors helpless as they can. We still haven't seen improvements on Huntress' hit registry, or the removal or nerf of her iridescent head addon that drains the fun out of the game for the survivors side, or clown's redhead pinky finger, or the cenobite's addon that injures you with the chain. None of those addons are hard to use for the killer, they all make the game x10 easier for the killer while draining the fun out of the game for the survivor, and you can't disconnect when you're not having fun in this game because there's a disconnection penalty YAAAAAAAY, because every game that has that is successful right? These unneeded changes that the developers keep making to the game have made me and many of my friends quit this game and they severely damage this game and the playerbase it has every time they happen. These changes are especially horrible for people like me that invest money into dlcs and cosmetics, now I won't be able to use any of my cosmetics because the game is not worth playing anymore at all.  This game just isn't it. It isn't the Dead By Daylight I know anymore.
If you aren't overly sensitive about losing a game then it's a-ok! I like the lore, personally and it is one I come back to every time I have no mood for other games.

I don't know how I have not written a review even after I somehow sunk 1000 hours into this game. 

This game is highly addictive and fun, but will make even the calmest individuals rage. The game has it's issues and the developers are often slow to fix them, but with the game constantly receiving updates, for casual players the game is never going to be dry and you will often find yourself coming back to it after a major change. 

For those who play a game fully and constantly play a game until it gets dry then you will get tired of this game very quickly, but for those of you with friends who would enjoy a good game to play casually and not take it too seriously, then this is a prime game for that. I learned that once my friends and I stopped taking this game so seriously, it became magnitudes more enjoyable.
It is a very amazing game !!!
Top tier game I love it. It's lots of fun and you can play on your own and play with friends it's so much more fun 10/10

I remember fondly playing this game as a killer main but its basically impossible to play killer casually anymore, due to the fact  that whenever you have people on hooks there are no downsides to just waiting and pulling them off the hook and taking the damage, because once they are off the hook they basically become invincible since they are now at full health, after that if you hit the other person they just run away

trash one sided games the devs are worthless trash that only improve survivors fun n make killers weak n pointless to play. If you win at all as killer its cuz the survivors are really stupid n cocky so they mess up a lot and I do mean alot for you to even have a chance n you'll still prolly lose cuz of all they second chance perks they have, or they throw trying to be toxic with friends on mics. Only time you'll really win and have fun as killer is when you are goin against new players playin solo but that gets boring fast when it does happen. They'll learn eventually how to abuse the mechanics on top of playing with a actual team communicating while the stupid devs make survivor easier and easier while at the same time release weak killer after weak killer, or give out unnecessary nerfs to killer . 2/10 shit game.

used to love this game but now is just....down right not fun and just boring to play. Ever since they implemented the new MMR system it has just been flat out boring. The ranking system is a complete slog to even get through on either side but killers noticeably have a harder time (on some wayy more than others) it doesnt feel like im accomplishing much as a survivor even if i were to escape form the killer cause most of the time it feels like im on a damn power trip. The gens are fast to do especially with tool boxes and most killers cannot stop you if you just rush to do them. I want to run fun perks but it feels like im being punished to even think of doing so. If im not running the 4 major meta perks, DC, BT, DH, and IW, then i just straight up dont escape. As killer it feels worse than before as you feel overall weak..even with meta perks equipped you are still on the short end of the stick. 9/10 matches you can already tell how they are going to go. its just not fun being killer anymore cause of how damn powerless you feel. Sure you can argue "get good " or even "its skill based" but this game is heavily survivor skewed. Its become a chore to chase survivor and overall just not as fun as it used to be. This game has taken a true fall from grace as did the community. If you cannot kill any survivors they will point out just how trash you are after game as killer. As survivors tunneling and camping is fine but people will trash you for getting that treatment. not only that but the whole new meme of the survivor rule book has become wayy too prominent for my liking. overall i want to love this game but in its current state with how everything feels on both sides i just cant

I've wanted to play this since around 2017 when they introduced The Huntress but I didn't start till last December. Warning: This game is addictive and very rage inducing, at least for me, I have problems with that. its got me hooked though and I return to it every day after getting enraged. Its a really fun game and besides some bugs and errors here and there, its great and I highly recommend it, as long as nothing I have said has detoured you yet lmao
